trans-unit.source: Wraps an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> whose execution is initialized by an event.
trans-unit.target: Packar ett <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> vars körning har initierats av en händelse.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan inte ärvas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] It is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> that is used to handle an event; typically it can be raised from the host or by the runtime in response to a delay timer expiring.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Det är en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>som används för att hantera en händelse, vanligtvis den kan aktiveras från värden eller av körningen som svar på en fördröjning timer upphör att gälla.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: EventDrivenActivity is inherited from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>; therefore, it is a sequence that has the additional restriction that the first activity should be an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity ärvs från <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>; det är därför en sekvens som har ytterligare begränsningar som den första aktiviteten att <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: The EventDrivenActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the EventDrivenActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity är en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, vilket innebär att EventDrivenActivity kan innehålla andra aktiviteter.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The EventDrivenActivity is similar to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> activity, with some additional characteristics.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity liknar den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>aktivitet, med vissa ytterligare egenskaper.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: An EventDrivenActivity must have a parent that is either a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: En EventDrivenActivity måste ha en överordnad som är antingen en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, eller <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The first child of an EventDrivenActivity activity must be an activity that inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Den första underordnat för en EventDrivenActivity aktivitet måste vara en aktivitet som ärver från <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: All subsequent children can be activities of any type.
trans-unit.target: Alla efterföljande underordnade kan vara aktiviteter för alla typer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> blocks and waits for the pending occurrence of some events, such as starting a timer or the arrival of a message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>blockerar och väntar på att den väntande förekomsten av vissa händelser, till exempel starta en timer eller ett meddelande har ankommit.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> finishes running and then all subsequent activities are executed.
trans-unit.target: När händelsen inträffar i <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>har slutförts körs och sedan alla efterföljande aktiviteter körs.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> contains an EventDrivenActivity, the EventDrivenActivity has some restrictions: - The EventDrivenActivity may contain one, and only one, activity of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>innehåller en EventDrivenActivity EventDrivenActivity har vissa begränsningar:-det EventDrivenActivity kan innehålla en och endast en aktivitet av typen <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> must be the first child activity.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>Måste vara den första underordnade aktiviteten.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> cannot be in the event handler for a child activity and cannot be a child to the EventDrivenActivity if the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is not the first child.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>får inte vara i hanteraren för en underordnad aktivitet och kan inte vara en underordnad EventDrivenActivity om den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>är inte den första underordnat.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: - As long as the first activity is the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, the event handler can contain any activities.
trans-unit.target: -Så länge som den första aktiviteten är den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, händelsehanteraren kan innehålla några aktiviteter.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: If an activity other than <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is contained in EventDrivenActivity, that activity cannot have an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Om en aktivitet än <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>finns i EventDrivenActivity, att aktiviteten inte kan ha en händelsehanterare.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that supports event handling can be used inside the EventDrivenActivity but the activity cannot have event handlers attached to itself.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel en aktivitet som stöder händelsehantering kan användas i EventDrivenActivity men aktiviteten kan inte ha händelsehanterare kopplade till sig själv.

trans-unit.source: Another example is that the EventDrivenActivity can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, but the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> itself cannot contain any <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> classes.
trans-unit.target: Ett annat exempel är att EventDrivenActivity kan innehålla en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, men <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>själva får inte innehålla något <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>klasser.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> klassen med namnet på aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The user-identified name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Användare identifieras namnet på aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar händelseaktiviteten som enheter ändringen.

trans-unit.source: The event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: Händelseaktiviteten som enheter ändringen.
